definitions: The nature of something's ingredients or constituents; the way in which a whole or mixture is made up.
The action of putting things together; formation or construction.
A thing composed of various elements.
A compound artificial substance or material.
The successive application of functions to a variable, the value of the first function being the argument of the second, and so on.
The process of finding the resultant of a number of forces.
A creative work, especially a poem or piece of music.
The action or art of producing a creative work such as a poem or piece of music.
An essay, especially one written by a school or college student.
The artistic arrangement of the parts of a picture.
The preparation of text for printing by setting up characters or by establishing its style and appearance electronically.
A legal agreement to pay a sum in lieu of a larger debt or other obligation.
A sum paid in lieu of a larger debt.
